ai slop everywhere
the qt6 version of bitcoin-qt in v30 flickers a bit when I move from e.g. Overview to Transactions
on wayland (with sway)
dviola: please submit an issue in https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/issues
hebasto: okay, will do
does not happen with QT_QPA_PLATFORM=xcb (xwayland)
dviola: include that in the issue please :)
sure
I remember trying an older version of qt6 bitcoin-qt and it didn't do this, will see if I can go back to that first
though that was probably with QT_QPA_PLATFORM=xcb
dviola: thanks for taking the trouble to report the issue/doing extra research
sure, my pleasure... I want to get down to this so that I can make a decent report at least
qt6ct seems to work fine

doesn't seem like a regression, went back to the first commits where qt6 was added and the issue is still there

janb84, hebasto: I believe I found something relevant
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/qt/guiutil.cpp#L406-L429
if I comment the code in         if (QGuiApplication::platformName() == "wayland") { the problem is gone
could be that calling w->show() two times is causing the flicker?
dviola: please maken an issue :) that's the place to discuss /  report it
sure
https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/issues/903

sdaftuar the minfee could have fallen in the interim post eviction, but I presume that would be very infrequent
instagibbs: then rebroadcasting would fix it?
s/would/could/ sure

right
